title: Gold Mine For Sale in Colombo 05 - Good Deal!
details:
Commercial Building for sale on Havelock road. This is a deal of a life time. You can make billions with this kind of property if you know your business and your business model very well. Why rent when you can buy this lovely gold mine.

10.4 perches
3 floors
Separate access point from adjoining street
Parking for 3 vehicles in front, 1 at the back and 4 alongside the road
4400sqft in total
4 washrooms
Fully tiled
5 rooms
2 large halls
Fully Air Conditioned
Back entrance with a separate storeroom

Inquire via email or by clicking ‘Contact Advertiser’ below with details about yourself. Serious and Genuine clients. All offers will have to be submitted in writing for approval. Write to info@mistert.lk to arrange a viewing.
